io.proximax.sdk.model.transaction

Class RegisterNamespaceTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.proximax.sdk.model.transaction.Transaction
      • io.proximax.sdk.model.transaction.RegisterNamespaceTransaction

  • public class RegisterNamespaceTransaction
extends Transaction
    Accounts can rent a namespace for an amount of blocks and after a this renew the contract. This is done via a RegisterNamespaceTransaction.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegisterNamespaceTransaction

        public RegisterNamespaceTransaction(NetworkType networkType,
                                    java.lang.Integer version,
                                    TransactionDeadline deadline,
                                    java.math.BigInteger maxFee,
                                    java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> signature,
                                    java.util.Optional<PublicAccount> signer,
                                    java.util.Optional<TransactionInfo> transactionInfo,
                                    java.lang.String namespaceName,
                                    NamespaceId namespaceId,
                                    java.util.Optional<java.math.BigInteger> duration,
                                    java.util.Optional<NamespaceId> parentId,
                                    NamespaceType namespaceType)
        Parameters:
        networkType - network type
        version - transaction version. Use EntityVersion.REGISTER_NAMESPACE for current version
        deadline - transaction deadline
        maxFee - transaction fee
        signature - optional signature
        signer - optional signer
        transactionInfo - optional transaction info
        namespaceName - name of the namespace
        namespaceId - id of the namespace (generated from name and optionally parent)
        duration - number of blocks for which the namespace will exist
        parentId - parent namespace ID for sub-namespaces
        namespaceType - root or sub namespace

        public NamespaceId getNamespaceId()
